items.name: SEAWEED SALAD

items.description: tofu, scallions, seaweed in a miso broth.

items.name: Tempura Shrimp
items.description: tempura shrimp with sushi sauce.

items.name: Dumplings
items.description: choice of pork, chicken, shrimp or spicy beef with Asian vegetables fried and served with Aqua sauce.

items.name: Edamame
items.description: boiled soybeans seasoned with salt.

items.name: Sushi Rice
items.description: premium short grain white rice and vinegar.

items.name: Half Platter
items.description: Drakes 3 most popular rolls on a shareable platter: spicy Cali, Tempura Shrimp, and Tuna Spring.

items.name: Full Platter
items.description: Drake's 3 most popular rolls on a shareable platter: Spicy Cali, Tempura Shrimp, and Tuna Spring.

items.name: Classic sushi, nigiri and sashimi
items.description: any classic sushi with 2 orders of nigiri or sashimi, served with miso soup.

items.name: Specialty Sushi, Nigiri and Sashimi
items.description: any specialty roll with 2 orders of nigiri or sashimi, served with miso soup.

items.name: Combination Platter
items.description: any 2 rolls with four orders of nigiri or sashimi, served with miso soup.

items.name: Mardi Party Roll

items.description: cooked eel, cucumber, avocado, seaweed, sesame seeds, sushi sauce.

items.name: Fantasy Roll (spicy)

items.name: Rainbow Roll
items.description: California; topped with tuna, salmon, shrimp, white tuna, and yellow tail.

items.name: New York Roll
items.description: tuna, avocado, seaweed; topped with tuna.

items.name: Boston Roll
items.description: salmon, avocado, seaweed; topped with salmon.

items.description: spicy tuna, avocado, seaweed; topped with seared white tuna.

items.name: Crunchy Munchy Roll

items.name: Surf and Turf Roll

items.description: crab and cream cheese blend, seaweed, tempura fried; topped with sushi sauce and sweet chili sauce.

items.name: Tempura Rainbow Roll

items.name: Volcano Roll

items.description: with sesame seeds.
